{"id":1784788084,"question_id":4015,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1759027497,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1784788084/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Split Array With Minimum Difference","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long splitArray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n\n        int l=0, lsum = 0;\n        for (; l<N-1; l++) {\n            lsum += nums[l];\n            if (nums[l] >= nums[l+1])\n                break;\n        }\n\n        int r=N-1, rsum = 0;\n        for (; r>=1; r--) {\n            rsum += nums[r];\n            if (nums[r-1] <= nums[r])\n                break;\n        }\n        if (l != r) return -1;\n        return min(abs((lsum - (rsum - nums[l]))), \n                   abs(((lsum - nums[l]) - rsum)));\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"split-array-with-minimum-difference","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1219}
